<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Harpy Skeleton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1298)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A live harpy's song is compelling and captivating; a harpy skeleton's is anything but, rending the target's mind.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Skeleton_HarpySkeleton.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Harpy Skeleton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1298)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 236</row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 60
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
cold 5, electricity 5, fire 5, piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
talon +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d6+7 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +15,
**Damage** 1d6+7 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +15 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 bludgeoning

**Shriek** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The harpy skeleton emits an unearthly, bone-chilling scream that deals 4d10 mental damage to all creatures in a 30-foot cone (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save). A creature that fails its save is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (or frightened 2 on a critical failure). The harpy skeleton can't Shriek again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-92" />
name: Harpy Skeleton
